1.0.name: wordpress/viewzi-site-search
1.0.description: Viewzi Site Search for WordPress takes all the visual wizardry that is found on Viewzi.com and integrates it into your site. Allow your readers to search your accounts on Flickr, smugmug, Picasa, Youtube, Vimeo or Viddler as well as your local blog content. Present your blog data in an intuitive timeline, or allow your readers to search your posts/pages and comments in one shot. All this and more is possible with the VSS Plugin for WordPress
